examples.text: I met <w>Elisa</w> at the library yesterday.
Does <w>Elisa</w> know about the surprise party?

senses.sense_definition: A proposed space mission designed to detect and measure gravitational waves; an acronym for evolved Laser Interferometer Space Antenna.

examples.text: The <w>eLISA</w> mission aims to study the universe in unprecedented detail.
Scientists are preparing complex data models for the upcoming <w>eLISA</w> project.

senses.sense_definition: A sensitive laboratory technique used to detect and quantify specific substances, such as proteins, antibodies, or hormones; an acronym for enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay.

examples.text: The doctor ordered an <w>ELISA</w> to confirm the presence of the infection.
We used an <w>ELISA</w> kit to measure the antibody levels in the sample.
